languages.text: "А суть ее проста: нарушь поставки, и привлечешь внимание. Гениальная ловушка, на которую прекрасно клюют Арбитес. Но судьба преподнесла мне особый подарок: в моих сетях оказал{mf|ся|ась} ты, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "А суть ее проста: поставляй больше — и привлечешь внимание, даже не нарушая закон. Гениальная ловушка, на которую прекрасно клюют Арбитесы. Но судьба преподнесла мне особый подарок: в моих сетях оказал{mf|ся|ась} ты, {name}".

languages.text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."
languages.original_text: "А суть ее проста: нарушь поставки, и привлечешь внимание. Гениальная ловушка, на которую прекрасно клюют Арбитес. Но судьба преподнесла мне особый подарок: в моих сетях оказал{mf|ся|ась} ты, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

"The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

"The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

languages.text: “计划很简单：扰乱运输工作，迫使对方回应。这是个巧妙的陷阱，那些法务官掉了进去。不过，命运还赐予了我特别的恩惠——你和他们一起落入了我的网中，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “计划很简单：扰乱运输工作，迫使对方回应。这是个巧妙的陷阱，那些法务官掉了进去。不过，命运还赐予了我特别的恩惠——你和他们一起落入了我的网中，{name}。”

languages.text: «La idea era muy simple: retener el envío a fin de provocar una respuesta. Una ingeniosa trampa en la que el Arbites se metió de cabeza. Pero el destino me sonrió cuando usted también quedó {mf|atrapado|atrapada} en mis redes, {name}».
languages.original_text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «La idea era muy simple: retener el envío a fin de provocar una respuesta. Una ingeniosa trampa en la que el Arbites se metió de cabeza. Pero el destino me sonrió cuando usted también quedó {mf|atrapado|atrapada} en mis redes, {name}».

languages.text: "Konsept basitti: Sevkiyatı aksat, tepkiye neden ol. Yargıcıların tam içine düştüğü dâhiyane bir tuzaktı. Fakat kader bana özel bir lütuf bahşetti: Onlarla birlikte sen de ağıma yakalandın {name}."
languages.original_text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Konsept basitti: Sevkiyatı aksat, tepkiye neden ol. Yargıcıların tam içine düştüğü dâhiyane bir tuzaktı. Fakat kader bana özel bir lütuf bahşetti: Onlarla birlikte sen de ağıma yakalandın {name}."

languages.text: 「構想は簡単だった。荷船を攻撃し、反応を引き起こす。裁定局がまんまとはまった巧妙な罠だ。しかし、運命は俺に特別な恵みを与えた―それはお前がやつらと一緒に俺の網に掛かったことだ、{name}」
languages.original_text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「構想は簡単だった。荷船を攻撃し、反応を引き起こす。裁定局がまんまとはまった巧妙な罠だ。しかし、運命は俺に特別な恵みを与えた―それはお前がやつらと一緒に俺の網に掛かったことだ、{name}」

languages.text: « Le concept était d'une simplicité enfantine : perturber la livraison et provoquer une réaction. Un piège des plus ingénieux, dans lequel l'Arbites a sauté à pieds joints. Mais le destin a été particulièrement généreux avec moi, puisque vous avez également été pris dans mes filets, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « Le concept était d'une simplicité enfantine : perturber la livraison et provoquer une réaction. Un piège des plus ingénieux, dans lequel l'Arbites a sauté à pieds joints. Mais le destin a été particulièrement généreux avec moi, puisque vous avez également été pris dans mes filets, {name}. »

languages.text: "Das Konzept war einfach: die Lieferung stören und eine Reaktion provozieren. Eine geniale Falle, in die die Arbites geradewegs hineingetappt sind. Doch das Schicksal hat mir ein besonderes Geschenk gemacht: Ihr seid mir mit ihnen zusammen ins Netz gegangen, {name}."
languages.original_text: "The concept was simple: disrupt the shipment and provoke a response. An ingenious trap that the Arbites walked right into. But fate granted me a special boon: you were caught in my net along with them, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Das Konzept war einfach: die Lieferung stören und eine Reaktion provozieren. Eine geniale Falle, in die die Arbites geradewegs hineingetappt sind. Doch das Schicksal hat mir ein besonderes Geschenk gemacht: Ihr seid mir mit ihnen zusammen ins Netz gegangen, {name}."
